name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape G2 Reviews And Download To Excel - Extract G2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ExtractG2 is a free tool that lets you instantly scrape G2 software reviews and export them to Excel with one click. No waiting for a scraping job to complete. 

No more wasted time copying and pasting software reviews.  

ExtractG2 Key FEATURES:

1-Click Export: Instant extraction of G2 software reviews. 
User-Friendly Format: Export reviews in a format that is easy to read for product analysis.
AI Summary: Summarize common themes found in user reviews. 
Easy to Use: Just install and you're good to go!

ExtractG2 USE CASES:

Competitor Research.
SaaS Idea Generation.
Anyone researching software reviews.


PREMIUM FEATURE: Scraping 100 pages in a single click, and the ability to download thousands of software reviews seamlessly into Excel.


Developer Commitment: We value and respect our user community. ExtractG2 contains no malware or spyware. 

For support reach out to extractg2@gmail.com.
